EmailTemplate.subject: Ignite 2015 - Last chance to get tickets to out biggest employability event of the year!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
The BIGGEST event in The Challenge Society calender in 2015 is less than a week away! Tickets for our Ignite 2015 event are selling out fast so if you haven't already, get your ticket and get involved in this fantastic event! Check out all the amazing workshops, partners, training events that you can be involved in. We are also excited to annouce our special guests for the event....
AFRIKAN BOY
AARON ROACH BRIDGEMAN FROM SBTV
CLICK HERE TO RESERVE YOUR SPACE!
WORKSHOPS
Personal Statements with Goldsmiths University
CV's and Cover Letters with The Challenge
Managing Your Personal Finances with The Money Charity
Introduction to Film Making by Chocolate Films
Customer Service and Communication with The Shard
Wellbeing and Stress Management with The Museum of Happiness
Professional Social Media with The Challenge
And many more....
PROFESSIONAL NETWORKING
Come and talk to professionals from over 40 different industries who will be available to speak to you about their careers!
We have professionals working in law, medicine, banking, finance, and technology.
Artists, musicians, designers, engineers, photographers, social workers, teachers, politicians...
Learn more about different careers, the benefits and challenges, and how you can get there!
TRAINING SESSIONS
Stay involved with The Challenge and work with our Sales and Staffing teams!
Become a Sales Ambassador Sales Ambassador and champion the National Citizen Service programme in your school!
Think Become a Youth Assessor and help us choose amazing staff for the National Citizen Service programme in 2016!
There will be limited spaces for training at Ignite - so arrive early to reserve your space!
COMPETITION TIME!
We want to give every NCS graduate the opportunity to be involved in Ignite - but we need your help! We need you to get online, into your school, back in touch with your wave and telling everyone about why they should also come down to Ignite!
The person who gets the most NCS graduates to sign up and attend on the day will win an IPad Mini! Winner!
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information, opportunities and competitions.
If you have any questions either check out our shiny new website, or send me an email at tcs.southlondon@the-challenge.org!
Rhiannon - Graduate Associate Manager
